widget.name: i Stretch $
widget.description: I choose. I compare. I stretch dollars. I track the best prices I find for the items I buy regularly. To compare price I can input size and unit of measure for an item to see the price per unit. for example, to understand the value of a small bottle as compared large bottle of juice, I can input a row for the 12 oz bottle priced at $2.40 and another row for the gal at $6.40. Then I see that the 12 oz bottle costs $.20/per oz, while the gallon is only $.10/per oz. When I drink a lot of orange juice, buying gallons will really stretch my dollars!
widget.author: Linton Hale
